style: Commercial Food Photography, High-Contrast Studio Setup, Zero Gravity Composition, Hyper-Detailed Macro Shot
use_case: Fast Food Advertising Campaigns (Digital Billboards, Social Media Ads)
template: [SUBJECT] floating composition, [PRESENTATION_STYLE], featuring dynamic [DYNAMIC_ELEMENT]. High-detail commercial photography, sharp focus, vibrant color saturation, captured against a pure, seamless monochromatic [BACKGROUND_COLOR] backdrop. Studio lighting, dramatic highlights, 8k, ultra-realistic.

variable_explanations.SUBJECT: The main item being photographed (e.g., Stacked Waffles, Exploded Sushi Roll, Layered Cocktail).
variable_explanations.PRESENTATION_STYLE: How the subject is visually presented (e.g., cross-section reveal, sliced in half, cascading layers).
variable_explanations.DYNAMIC_ELEMENT: The element that provides action and texture (e.g., Molten chocolate drizzle, steam rising, powdered sugar cloud, liquid splash).
variable_explanations.BACKGROUND_COLOR: The single, solid color that fills the background, creating high contrast (e.g., Neon Green, Cyan, Burnt Orange).

tips: Use colors in the [BACKGROUND_COLOR] variable that directly contrast or complement the main subject's color palette (e.g., Blue background for red meat, Yellow for purple dessert).
If the subject has a golden/crisp texture (like fried food), include 'vibrant golden texture' in the prompt to enhance that characteristic.
For complex subjects, use negative weights or aspect ratio controls if the AI struggles with the 'floating' composition.
description: A powerful, scalable template designed for stunning commercial visuals. It isolates the subject against a vibrant, monochromatic background while emphasizing texture, dynamic action (like dripping sauce or rising steam), and meticulous studio lighting for maximum appetite appeal.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

suggestions: Consider: rustic, muted, whimsical, mysterious, modern
Add: scene, design, poster, illustration, wallpaper

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: The title, 'Cinematic Portrait of a [Subject] -- Epic Photography,' is highly descriptive but fails on the length requirement (7 words). The inclusion of 'Epic Photography' clearly conveys the output type and tone, but the structure is slightly cumbersome. To achieve a perfect score, titles must be concise and strictly adhere to the 3-6 word limit.
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: This template is exemplary. The subject variable is clearly marked using standard conventions (`[SUBJECT]`). The core style descriptors (stunning, hyper-detailed, dramatic, cinematic) dominate the initial structure, ensuring style priority. The technical stack (ARRI Alexa 65, specific lens/aperture, lighting, and raw style parameter) is complete, highly specific, and directly supports the 'Cinematic' promise. This is a robust, high-performing template.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: The quality and range of the examples provided (Astronaut, Samurai, Cybernetic dog, Abstract Hope) are excellent, demonstrating the template's versatility across history, sci-fi, and conceptual art. However, only 6 examples were provided. To meet the marketplace standard for demonstrating full range and subject compatibility, 8-10 diverse examples must be included.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: The commercial package is strong. Use cases (Book Covers, Concept Art, NFTs) are clearly defined and align perfectly with the high-fidelity output style. The suggested price tier ($1.99) is appropriate for a prompt that leverages advanced technical specifications. The specific focus on professional cinema equipment (ARRI Alexa specs) provides a unique and highly desirable value proposition for users seeking premium quality.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: The description is well-structured and marketplace-ready. The hook ('Get incredible, professional-grade images instantly!') is immediate and results-focused. All necessary technical features (ARRI Alexa specs, lighting control) and commercial use cases are clearly listed, making the prompt easy for buyers to understand and utilize immediately.

priority_improvements: Refine the Title: Shorten the title to 6 words or less while maintaining descriptive power. Suggestion: 'Epic Cinematic Portrait Photography'.
Expand Variable Examples: Add 2-4 additional diverse examples (e.g., historical figure, natural element, futuristic vehicle) to reach the required 8-10 minimum.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Instantly transform your concepts into gallery-quality, high-contrast monochromatic photography that screams luxury and sophistication.

*   Built-in Hyper-Detail Engine: Achieves microscopic clarity and flawless texture mapping, ensuring every result is print-ready and commercially viable.
*   Signature Dramatic Grayscale: Automatically applies sophisticated, high-dynamic range black and white conversion, mimicking top-tier studio lighting setups without a single lighting modifier prompt.
*   Zero-Skill Required Composition: Forget focal lengths and camera anglesâ€”this template handles the complex compositional rules for maximum visual impact, regardless of your subject.

Perfect for elevated product mockups, impactful social media campaigns, luxury brand identity visuals, and building a portfolio that demands attention.

Stop coding prompts and start creating masterpieces. This template is your effortless, one-click shortcut to the highest echelon of commercial photography.
